title: Advanced OOP with Python. Beyond the basics.
description: This course teaches Object Oriented Design in Python beyond intermediate level. The course solidifies and deepens your knowledge about classes, objects, inheritance and polymorphism. You will learn many Python specific class and object implementation details of construction, overriding and overloading. Work through many exercises that allows you to practice common OOP tasks.
courseObjectives: make better decisions when and how to use OOP features in your code
use inheritance for nominal sub typing and prevent duplicate code
create more efficient classes by integrating Python’s built-in language features
adhere to the open closed principle with Polymorphism
use protocols to achieve structural subtyping
learn Python’s unique way to implement encapsulation

title: Mastering Data Science with Python
description: An in-depth data science course using Python, covering data wrangling, analysis, and visualization. Perfect for aspiring data scientists.
courseObjectives: gain proficiency in data cleaning and manipulation
learn data visualization techniques using Matplotlib and Seaborn
apply machine learning algorithms on real-world datasets
explore deep learning basics with TensorFlow and PyTorch
develop data analysis skills to solve real-world problems

title: JavaScript: From Beginner to Advanced
description: A comprehensive JavaScript course for web developers, covering everything from the basics to advanced ES6+ features.
courseObjectives: understand JavaScript fundamentals
master ES6+ syntax and features
learn asynchronous programming with promises and async/await
build interactive web applications
implement best practices in JavaScript code

title: Full-Stack Web Development with React and Node.js
description: A project-based course covering full-stack development with React on the frontend and Node.js/Express on the backend.
courseObjectives: build dynamic, responsive web applications
use React for interactive frontend development
integrate backend APIs with Express and MongoDB
apply authentication and authorization
deploy full-stack applications to production

title: Machine Learning A-Z: Hands-On Python & R In Data Science
description: Learn Machine Learning from scratch in Python and R, with projects in classification, regression, and clustering.
courseObjectives: understand supervised and unsupervised learning
apply regression, classification, and clustering techniques
implement machine learning models in Python and R
evaluate model performance and optimize algorithms
work on real-world datasets to build practical skills

title: Introduction to Cybersecurity
description: Gain a solid foundation in cybersecurity fundamentals, including threat analysis, network security, and cryptography.
courseObjectives: understand cybersecurity principles
identify and analyze security threats
learn network security and access control
explore encryption and cryptographic protocols
gain practical skills in risk assessment

title: iOS Development for Beginners
description: This beginner-friendly course teaches iOS app development using Swift and Xcode, covering the basics of UIKit and SwiftUI.
courseObjectives: understand Swift programming basics
create UI with UIKit and SwiftUI
integrate APIs and data persistence
develop user-friendly iOS applications
publish apps to the App Store

title: Data Visualization with Tableau
description: Learn to create compelling data visualizations and dashboards with Tableau for data-driven decision-making.
courseObjectives: create data visualizations and dashboards
use Tableau’s analytical tools effectively
explore data preparation and cleaning
integrate data from various sources
tell stories with data visualizations

title: Blockchain Fundamentals
description: An introductory course on blockchain technology, covering distributed ledgers, smart contracts, and cryptocurrencies.
courseObjectives: understand blockchain concepts and terminology
explore distributed ledger technologies
learn about cryptocurrency basics
implement basic smart contracts
analyze blockchain security and privacy

title: AWS Certified Solutions Architect
description: Prepare for the AWS Solutions Architect certification exam with this in-depth course on AWS cloud infrastructure and architecture.
courseObjectives: learn core AWS services and solutions
design resilient and high-performing architectures
understand security and compliance on AWS
prepare for the AWS Solutions Architect exam
gain hands-on experience with AWS tools
